1.content: Many Years have passed since the warrior, milia crushed the naga tribes, and their queen, but what the nagas didn't expect, is that their queen's young daughter took vengance for her mother, now that very same daughter has clearly advanced the naga tribe's in terms of social ladder, meanwhile, in the old apartment complex, several driders have risen up in alliance with the nagas, due to their 'similarities' with their cravings. also, a tribe of uber-busty, top heavy fuzzballs, lead by a tigress by the name of Kitera. she hopes to prove her tribe's strength. as well as several other tribes will show up. The only question is: Who'll you side with....?
1.title: INTRO

11.content:
The Naga Empire is a fleeting, but mountainous & forest dwelling tribe of nagas, their capital: Cuntgulpia, is highly defended, and easily the worst place a human survivor can be, unless that refugee has a special permit from the holy empress of all nagas, she goes by the name of Isis. she is easily the biggest, hungriest, and horniest naga of the entire Empire! however, several of milia's daughters seek to uproot her, but their elements are what she resists easily. (Fire, Water, Lightning) and they must learn to control their powers better, if they are to survive.

Isis Appearance: http://img2.gelbooru.com//images/13/379ee77577b9d93f9e8f243326afe79df7c2d059.jpg...

The Daughters are all wearing similar clothes, that are like their mother's, except each have been personally colored to match their elemental magicks.
11.title: Naga Empire

15.content:
The Consortium of Demonesses/Magicians Resides in the demon realm of "Asgard" and they are lead by the benevolent Succubi Queen, Lilium Lashiec. (Credit to her author) and they are a primarily lesbian-oriented culture, with women taking dominance over the male Incubi tribe of demons, they serve as lowly peasants and workers for the noble succubi clans. therefore, they are remedial labour and boob-snacks, as well as cunt-food, and there is the occasional tail-voring among Lilium's Inner Circle. However, the daughters of Shadow, Light, and Wind have proven to be a thorn in Her side. The Question is now: Who's life of luxury, will you live?

{Link: http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2010/1...)
15.title: Consortium of Demonesses/Magicians

151.content: Lilium's Personal Slave, Royce Lashiec, was bound in a magic cage of anti-magic steel, and Lilium says "So, Royce. have you admit to your crimes yet? If not, you'll be suffering a punishment of MY choosing." and Royce mutters "...Go to hell, you bitch." and he clearly was pissed at how she came back to life. and Lilium was clearly thinking about how to punish him.
151.title: Lilium Lashiec (Busty Demon Queen)

choices: Go look for Tit Food! (Two Incubi)
Go look for an Incubi to Unbirth, and have twins with! (Single UB)
1512.content: The Demon Queen Rubbed her Tail Erotically, and says "I know EXACTLY what to do with you, Slave." and the incubi noticed something was very different about The Demon Queen's tail, as it had a tiny, clandestine hole meant for something very, very delicious, or in common terms, "Eating with the tail, literally" and the Incubi began struggling fervently.
1512.title: Tail-Vore Him! (Sexier Tail)

choices: Find yourself a new Slave before Digestion (Skip to Tonight)
Have some Sensual "Fun" with your most trusted Strategist. (Lesbo Loving)
1513.content: Lilium's Face twisted into a rather sexual, but devious smile, and her Incubi-slave noticed this, and saw her stripping down, which is BAD for him, and he wonders just why she's stripping down, unless she doesn't wanna rip her precious clothes, and he realizes that he's about to be fat on her tits & hips, and he says nothing, only to look down and notice that his feet were already going up her ravenous, dripping slit, and he starts to curse at her, and struggle furiously!
1513.title: Unbirth Him! (General Sexiness)
